member.name: SYNCMGR_CANCEL_REQUEST
member.summary: Describes a request by the user to cancel a synchronization.

member.name: SYNCMGR_CANCEL_REQUEST.SYNCMGR_CR_NONE
member.summary: No cancelation request has been made.

member.name: SYNCMGR_CANCEL_REQUEST.SYNCMGR_CR_CANCEL_ITEM
member.summary: Stop the synchronization of the current item, but continue the synchronization of other items.
